title: Good app
comment: Is there a widget available for this app? Works perfectly well but could be awesome!  Changed rating to excellent after widget was added. Well done developer!

There is no widget, and has never been. I'll look into it, and see what I can do about it.
edit: Widget is already available in latest version of app :-)
Love it.

title: Easy to use, could have bulk download
comment: Good app, quite intuitive and easy to use. I just wish it had some sort of bulk download feature (for example: download all strips of this year or from last month, or even let me choose the date interval). It would be useful for me, because I like to read the comics when I'm on the subway, so I can't just download them as I scroll.

Hello Maira, it's interesting suggestion, I'll look into that, but bulk downloading is not very easy, because we don't know the image urls and we would have to download both pages for all dates in range and then images. I'll see what I can come up with, without official support from Dilbert.com

title: Best
comment: Best Dilbert viewing app I've used!

title: Great app.
comment: Only downside is the inability to share via sms.
Hello Kenneth, I'm using standard Android way of sharing, I can see SMS share option on my phone, your phone probably doesn't support this option.
Very nice.  Works great, no ads.  Perfection.

title: A great app

Hi Peter, hope everything is OK with the latest update (3.3), if not, please tell me, I'll try to fix it asap.

title: Best Dilbert Reader yet!
comment: Excellent app - hope it doesn't disappear like all the other unofficial Dilbert Readers have in the past. (edit) Widget now working fine. Best app developer I have EVER dealt with. Sorts problems ASAP. Would like to give 5 stars PLUS if possible!
Hi Scott, I probably found a problem that is causing widget invisibility on some phones, please wait a while for an update.

title: Superbly simple Dilbert app
comment: This is a fantastic way to get the latest Dilbert pushed each day. The widget is superb, as is the ability to quickly select a date or random Dilbert. Top notch.
:-) Thank you very much Adam. Much appreciate this kind of feedback !
Now I have my favorite Dilbert strips with me
Nice :-)
Wonderful
Thanks :-)

title: Great app
comment: I like the new transitions between strips. It's much clearer that way. As comments, I have a bug to report, and a suggestion to make: please return the old layout of the strips with 6 boxes (in 2 rows). Putting all boxes in a line makes them too small to read. The bug is a strange one. Every once in a while, the app disappears from the launcher for no reason. I haven't seen this behavior with any other app. Keep on the good work!
Hi Noam, thanks for your feedback. Edit: In new update, I made sure, everybody will see strips in 2 rows. The problem was in handling low-quality setting.

title: Great app, does what it should
comment: ... and well, i.e. show me the strip. No unnecessary flannel, extras like favorites don't get in the way. I like the new transitions between strips, it's a much smoother experience. It seems quicker as well, which I guess is a result of the caching.
:-) Glad to make you so happy. I really appreciate your feedback!

title: Great improvements!
comment: In a previous version of this review I suggested the following features, and the developer responded by adding them. Really nice work! "I'd like to see a transition as you swipe from one day to the next (like when you swipe from one window to another in the launcher, for example). Even more, I'd like to see a widget."

Hi, I'll take a look, and see if I can provide widget.
I've never used widget for Dilbert app. Thanks  
edit: Widget is already available in latest version of app :-)

title: Great
comment: Best Dilbert app

title: Great app!

Even without a widget, this app is by far the best Android-based comic reader I have ever used!

Hi Roy, I'm already working on the mentioned features. Give me few days, to lead it to perfection :-)
edit: Widget is already available in latest version of app :-)

title: Best Dilbert reader!
comment: Would love to see a view feature where it pre-zooms in on each square of the strip, and allows to swipe to the next. I saw this feature in another dilbert reader but it got removed from the play store.

Hi Tommy, thanks for your praise :-) However, I'm not going to implement browsing by squares of strips. You have option to zoom and move by yourself, for now I consider it enough. You have a big device (Galaxy S II), try using it in horizontal rotation.

title: Well done
comment: I'm pleased to give you 5 stars, kindly man.
:) Thank you very much

title: Well Done
comment: Nice little app.  Loads up comics without issues, and I like the feature for favourites.  Only small issue is the action bar doesn't show the zoom icon in landscape mode (Samsung Galaxy S2).
Thank you very much, in next release I will switch icons "Reload" and "Zoom", because Zoom is in my opinion more important :-)
